channel.title: How can i stop the weather on my server?
channel.description: how can i stop weather on my server?? is there a way of removing it or something, or a command that stops it because ::nosnow only works for admins. can anyone help plz.

item.title: How can i stop the weather on my server?
item.dc:creator: @Satans_Child Satans Child
item.description:
@Satans_Child wrote:

im not to sure but where commands are search for ::no snow and change player rights to 0
